name: Escape The Facility
description:
You are a scientist and run a well-known testing lab that tests AI to see if they are stable for release.

One day, a pandemic hits, all of your employees are forced to go home.
As you are leaving, you accidentally push a switch, getting locked into a chair and being trapped in a testing facility run by an experimental AI.
As all of your employees are under lockdown, you are stuck in the lab.
Finish the tests and escape the facility.

Controls.

WASD to move.

Mouse to grab objects.

How to play.

Move around using buttons and moving platforms to get to the decontamination capsules to open the doors.

Install Instructions.

Download the .zip file and extract it, open up the extracted folder and run the executable, That's it :)

Made by Rhaskia and Galaxy Developer for: PAX Game Jam
